thread.title_full: Less than impressed - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 916kaylag
title: Less than impressed
text:
Pros:
Nice central location
Nice looking lobby
Good atmosphere in bar
Cons:
Tiny rooms and bathrooms (your knees actually hit the wall when on toilet- almost laughable)
Staff at check-in very rude
No one at garage/valet seemed to know what to do to get our car parked- very unorganized
Staff still came into our room to clean even with Privacy sign on the doorknob
Overall, less than impressed with our experience. If it wasn't for its central location I'd have given it one star, and that'd have been pushing it
